SCTX:
Begin varusVantiniusScript

short doOnce

if ( doOnce == 1 )
	Return
endif

if ( GetJournalIndex IL_Grandmaster < 10 )
	Return
endif

if ( GetPCCell "Vivec, Arena Pit" == 0 )
	Return
endif

if ( duelActive == 0 )
	Return
endif

if ( OnDeath == 1 )
	Set DuelActive to 0
	Set doOnce to 1
	PCRaiseRank "Imperial Legion"
	Journal IL_Grandmaster 100
endif

End
